title: Exploring the E-Learning 2.0 Ecosystem Model: ICT-Based Social Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Proficiency in Digital Device Utilization and Foundational Understanding of Social Change
context.additional_context: Social domain educational program for office/administrative professionals, conducted in BYOD environments with a formative assessment focus

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core components of the E-Learning 2.0 ecosystem model.
Design learning strategies that adapt to changing societal needs by utilizing ICT tools
Build and share e-learning ecosystem scenarios with peer learners through collaborative platforms
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
